Purpose: Quantitative determination of Immunoglobulin E specific to Greek Fennel (Foeniculum vulgare) in serum for clinical diagnosis and allergen-specific immunotherapy management.
Container: Blood collection tube for serum (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: ELISA plate reader, ELISA washer, 37°C incubator, precision pipettes, refrigerator (2-8°C), freezer (−20°C)
